columns.School_Colors: The color scheme associated with the school.
columns.School_ID: The unique identifier for each school.
columns.Location: The geographical area where the school is situated.
columns.Enrollment: The total number of students enrolled at the school.
columns.Founded: The year the school was established.
columns.Denomination: The religious affiliation of the school.
columns.Boys_or_Girls: The gender composition of the school.
columns.Day_or_Boarding: The type of school experience offered: day or boarding.
columns.Year_Entered_Competition: The year the school first participated in competitions.

school.table_description: The table provides information about various schools and their attributes.

columns.School_Id: The unique identifier for each school.
columns.School_Year: The academic year of the performance data.
columns.Class_A: The name of schools in Class A category.
columns.Class_AA: The name of schools in Class AA category.

school_performance.table_description: The table provides performance data for schools categorized by year and class.

columns.Player_ID: The unique identifier for each player.
columns.Team: The team the player is affiliated with.
columns.Position: The playing position of the player.
columns.School_ID: The unique identifier for the school associated with the player.

player.table_description: The table provides information about players and their respective teams and schools.

columns.School_ID: The unique identifier for each school record.
columns.Nickname: The commonly used name of the school.
columns.Colors: The color scheme associated with the school.
columns.League: The league in which the school competes.
columns.Class: The classification category of the school.
columns.Division: The division within the league where the school is placed.

school_details.table_description: The table provides detailed information about schools and their competitive classifications.
